greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of Pythagorean triangles with area n.
comment: The first term > 1 is a(210) = 2, cf. A009127, A055193 and A024407. Up to there the sequence coincides with the characteristic function of A009112. The triangles are not necessarily primitive.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index to sequences related to Pythagorean triples
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Dec 09 2010
ext: Secondary offset added by _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 24 2017
